game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the hidden treasure on Skull Island
game.description: You have received a map that leads to a lost treasure hidden deep within Skull Island. Embark on an epic adventure to find the treasure and claim it as your own.
game.reward: A chest full of gold doubloons

task.description: Sail towards Skull Island through treacherous waters and avoid dangers along the way.
Search the island for clues and solve puzzles to uncover the exact location of the treasure.
Battle powerful guardians protecting the treasure. Use your skills and strategy to overcome them.
task.location: Inner chamber of the treasure cave

task.description: Locate the hidden chamber and retrieve the treasure. Beware of traps and obstacles on your way back.
